title: BRIEF-TMX Group Consolidated Trading Statistics - March 2018
text:
April 4, 2018 / 4:16 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-TMX Group Consolidated Trading Statistics - March 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - TMX Group Ltd: 
* ALL TMX EQUITIES MARKETPLACES TRANSACTIONS WAS 21.5 MILLION FOR MARCH 2018 VERSUS 24.2 MILLION IN MARCH 2017 
* ALL TMX EQUITIES MARKETPLACES VOLUME WAS 12.11 BILLION IN MARCH 2018 VERSUS 14.73 BILLION IN MARCH 2017 
* ALL TMX EQUITIES MARKETPLACES DAILY AVERAGES VOLUME WAS 576.8 MILLION IN MARCH 2018 VERSUS 640.3 MILLION IN MARCH 2017 
* ALL TMX EQUITIES MARKETPLACES DAILY AVERAGES TRANSACTIONS WAS 1.0 MILLION IN MARCH 2018 VERSUS 1.1 MILLION IN MARCH 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
